DOC.brief_summary: Mask ventilation induction anesthesia improve administration neuromuscular block agent ( NMBAs ) . NMBAs usually administer test mask ventilation ; however , muscle relaxant may improve mask ventilation alter mask ventilation . Thus , grow evidence suggest administer muscle relaxant test mask ventilation . We study different dosage rocuronium ; assume high dosage rocuronium improve mask ventilation compare low dosage .
DOC.detailed_description: Mask ventilation induction anesthesia improve administration neuromuscular block agent ( NMBAs ) . NMBAs usually administer test mask ventilation ; however , muscle relaxant may improve mask ventilation alter mask ventilation . Thus , grow evidence suggest administer muscle relaxant test mask ventilation.We administer rocuronium 0.3 mg/kg , 0.6 mg/kg , 0.9 mg/kg saline ( placebo group ) start mask ventilation . We grade mask ventilation base various score rocuronium application . Afterwards patient ` tracheas intubate . We assess risk factor difficult mask ventilation . We hypothesize rocuronium 0.9 mg/kg superior rocuronium 0.3 mg/kg saline .
DOC.criteria: patient ASA IIII require tracheal intubation inform consent know allergy anesthetic know difficult airway
